desc: Beautifully handcrafted Designer Hats, made to order. Exclusive collection of timeless, and chic hats and headpieces. Suitable for weddings, and Royal Ascot incl. Royal Enclosure. Colour matching. Millinery, fascinators, racewear, fashion, wedding, Duchess of Cambridge, mother of the bride, Royal Weddings.

layout.text: The latest editions to our Spring/Summer Collection were inspired by the Asterope butterfly and springtime flowers.
